answerList: In both programs Thymio's LEDs will be yellow when the right button is pressed.
In the program on top, Thymio's LEDs will be yellow if the right button is pressed and in the program below they will be blue.
In both programs Thymio's LEDs will be blue when the right button is pressed.
In both programs, when the right button is pressed, sometimes the LEDs will be blue and sometimes they will be yellow.
In the program on top, Thymio's LEDs will be blue if the right button is pressed and in the program below they will be yellow.
